JobFullDesc: Be a part of Advanced Technology pursuits!Raytheon Missiles and Defense (RMD) has an opening for a Principal Specialist, Contracts within RMD’s Advanced Technology organization, which focuses on key pursuits as well as development efforts that serve as the growth engine and front of the business, critical to the future growth of RMD. The individual in this role will be part of a team of Contracts professionals supporting the Advanced Air Warfare Systems (AAWS), Advanced Enabling Technology (AET), and Integrated Kill Chain Architecture (IKCA) portfolios of programs, including competitive pursuits. The individual in this role will be the Contracts lead for the Counter Air-Science & Technologies (CAST) suite of programs, as well as provide support to proprietary efforts and pursuits. This role includes analysis of Request for Proposals (RFP), proposal reviews and coordination, contract negotiation, estimate at completion (EAC) reviews, support of program management and execution reviews, Intellectual Property and investment strategy development, and general contract administration. Responsibilities include working closely with the Portfolio Directors, Program Managers, Chief Engineers, Business/Estimating, and Supply Chain to construct, submit and negotiate pricing proposals; providing guidance to senior management regarding contractual and business issues; ensuring that negotiated terms and conditions comply with company policies; advising management of contractual rights and obligations and possible mitigation of contractual/program risks.Please note that this role will be primarily on-site at RMD Tucson. There is flexibility for telecommuting initially, but please note that relocation to Tucson is expected within 3 months of acceptance.About Us:Raytheon Missiles and Defense (RMD) provides the industry's most advanced end-to-end solutions, delivering the advantage of one innovative partner that connects vision with precision to detect, track, intercept and neutralize threats. We’re on a mission to create a safer future by being the place our customers turn to tackle their most complex challenges. Our broad portfolio includes air and missile defense systems, precision weapons, radars, command and control systems, and advanced defense technologies.Our RMD Contracts teammates are valued business partners, influencing and executing balanced business deals, collaborating with internal and external stakeholders, all in support of the products and services we deliver to our customers. With a global portfolio of clients, partners, and suppliers, the development opportunities for our Contracts professionals are endless, both domestically and abroad.Our success is driven by a strong culture, investing in our people, and by embracing the perspectives of a diverse workforce.
